raw_body: BASNAYAKE – DR. SRIANI – Wife of the late Ralph Wickremeratne,​ mother of Shariya and Yasassri Mendis,​ sister of Nirmala Labrooy and the late Dr. Lakdasa (Laki) Dissanayaka. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Monday,​ 19th February,​ from 9.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves parlour on the same day at 2.30 p.m. for cremation at 3.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Old Crematorium). No flowers by request please.012230
